answers.answer: Every time I get pregnant my blood pressure goes up so I have to be medicated and always induced early because in the end it goes out of control

Did you maybe have caffeine right before the appointment? My last appt they said the same thing but I told then about the coffee I just drank and they said oh that's it then. My woke pregnancy I've had low blood pressure so it shocked my nurse and she was saying if it was just because then they would need to watch it.
Ok thank you ladies and yes right before my appt i had a sprite

Sprite is caffeine free :).. Lol that's how I was I've never had high blood pressure until about 2 weeks ago at like 35 weeks n now I'm being induced tomorrow bc I have preeclampsia but hopeful you were just nervous or somethin
You may need to lower your sodium intake. That too can cause high BP. You need to look at some of the things you eat. It needs to be 500mg of sodium or lower also fatty fried food will do it to.

question: Ok so i have never in my life had high  blood pressure. I went to see my obgyn August 29 everything was fine  and i went in September 26 and they said my pressure was high and i might need to be on medication. But i go back in two weeks because my doctor thinks it was because i was nervous or anxious. So in two weeks if its still high i have to be on medication. Need advice
title: high blood pressure while pregnant
